creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Narrow panel of crimson satin brocaded with rows of dragon medallions and stylized clouds in shades of turquoise, yellow, blue, rose and gold threads. Cf. 42.8.174. Border of plain rust red satin bound on both sides with thin blue silk. Lining of coarse white cotton.
title: Narrow Panel
